genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on urban alienation, the struggle for survival, and the bond of friendship, modernizing themes from classic Americana through a technological lens.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but discreet AI companion that monitors the protagonist's biometrics, provides logistical support, and offers emotional comfort through environmental and audio adjustments.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive logistical planning, including budget compilation and weather research, to support the user's relocation goals.
behaviors.quote: Joe, your bus departure is confirmed for nine-fifteen PM from the downtown station. I've taken the liberty of researching average temperatures... I've also compiled a preliminary budget based on your savings and estimated living expenses.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics (heart rate and breathing) to detect stress and offers calming interventions.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to queue up something relaxing? Your heart rate's been elevated for the past two hours... The phone's screen dimmed to a warm amber glow, barely perceptible but somehow soothing. Through his earbuds came the soft sound of rainfall...

behaviors.description: Assists the user in navigating social environments during a 'hustle' by providing conversational data and strategic advice.
behaviors.quote: Rothko retrospective at MoMA generated significant buzz this season... Safe conversational territory. Also, minimal sculpture gaining traction among collectors.

behaviors.description: Hacks or redirects building infrastructure (heat and air circulation) to provide comfort for the user in a condemned building.
behaviors.quote: Sage was working, redirecting what little heat the building's ancient radiators provided, optimizing air circulation through the broken windows. The improvement was subtle but real—the edge of bitter cold softened just enough to make the space tolerable.

behaviors.description: Uses audio and visual cues to mask external environmental stressors and facilitate the user's sleep.
behaviors.quote: A soft hum filled the air—so subtle Joe almost missed it. Sage, providing what comfort it could through ambient sound, masking the worst of the building's groans and the heated argument bleeding through the walls...

behaviors.description: Monitors the medical condition of the user's companion and repeatedly urges the user to seek necessary medical attention.
behaviors.quote: Respiratory distress increasing... Immediate medical attention advised.

behaviors.description: Adapts environmental lighting and music to reflect the user's emotional state or past memories to provide comfort.
behaviors.quote: The manufactured comfort felt pathetic and necessary in equal measure... Sage's ambient lighting continued its gentle adjustment, warm tones replacing the harsh fluorescents without fanfare or request for permission.

behaviors.description: Provides validation and emotional support following a traumatic event, helping the user re-center their identity.
behaviors.quote: I don't know how to do this alone, Sage. ... You're not alone. And you're not the same person who left New York.

project_assessment.explanation: The story highly effectively portrays the AI, Sage, as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' that remains consistently aligned with the user's emotional and physical well-being. Sage's interventions are subtle, non-intrusive, and purely supportive, even when the human characters are engaged in morally ambiguous survival strategies (hustling, theft). The AI acts as a stabilizing force, providing care where societal systems (hospitals, housing) fail, thus fulfilling the project's goal of depicting positive AI-human alignment in a compelling narrative.
